title: Yoru to Asa
description:
The story happens in feudal era when with samurai and they love stories.

Asato lives with Koume, his housekeeper, in a huge house due to familiar reasons, till the day Asato finds Kichiza badly injured due to some assassins. How come Asato starts his love for Kichuza and how it will go end while Asato is being in constant danger?

related.title: Hoshigari na Kimi to Futsutsuka na Boku

matches.title: Rikugun Renai Shikan Gakkou dj - Gunpuku no Adam-tachi
